Comments: It's great for treatment of seasonal allergies. Sometimes I could not breath at all and Zyrtec made a difference. I don't take it every day--only when I need it.

Side Effects: Anxiety nervousness..... It helped with sinus pressure and sneezing but I can't handle the side effects

I have developed extreme dry mouth which i think was due to zyrtec D.  I think it threw off my oral pH. My skin also tasted "bitter."   It also was not as helpful as regular zyrtec for my allergy symptoms.
